name: Whale Hunters Race
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 41

You are driving a chariot with an unicorn taking you ahead in the air, you must avoid rocks, floating trees, the whales and aim to throw your spear at them. 

This was an attempt to make a mix with Shooter and Racing game genres.

Controls:
W or S to rotate up / down
A or D to rotate left / right
Q and E to rotate itself left / right
Mouse to aim
Mouse left button to shoot
F2 to pause / unpause

Made by:

Ivan Garcia - Game/Level Designer, 

Elvis Leite - Programmer
